shows.title: Fire and Water: Making the Avatar Films
shows.plot_overview: This two-part documentary provides a fascinating glimpse into the making of the Oscar-winning box office phenomenon "Avatar: The Way of Water" and features exclusive behind-the-scenes footage, concept art, and interviews with cast and filmmakers.

shows.title: THR ADRENALINE MAN
shows.plot_overview: The real and extreme life of Andre "Relentless" Alexsen spans 35 years of real and extreme adventures, ranging from stuntman and daredevil, to wild animal handler and trainer, and working and training with the U.S. military.

shows.title: Alex vs ARod
shows.plot_overview: From the pinnacle of athletic success to the depths of scandal, Alex Rodriguez saw his prolific baseball career marred by a high-profile suspension for performance-enhancing drug use. Told through a series of intimate interviews with Rodriguez, explore the dualities of one of the most polarizing figures in sports.

shows.title: Surviving Mormonism with Heather Gay
shows.plot_overview: Heather Gay explores the secrets and sins behind the Mormon church, fracturing the church's seemingly perfect veneer to expose the secrets that have been kept behind closed doors. Heather has impactful conversations with abuse survivors, ex-Mormons and former LDS church leaders.

shows.title: Tomfoolers
shows.plot_overview: Three friends consisting of a recent college graduate named Mathew, A monkey hybrid wannabe gangster named Doug and Mathew's childhood friend named Dason try to live their everyday lives but are bombard with obstacles along the way. From getting framed for a crime they didn't commit to evil double gangers trying to replace them, No matter the situation the dynamic trio always find a way out.
